text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: I was wondering… Could you treat me one more time?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
You see, when I was little, I read a lot of picture books. They taught 
me how to dream.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
So now it's my turn. I want to make a picture book that'll inspire 
others to dream.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
The skies became dark, and storms raged on for days and days. 
Violent winds bellowed down from the mountains as they shook with 
anger.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
"I wish someone would make the scary weather go away and give us 
clear skies."

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
The people all made the same wish, and that's when the witch 
appeared.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
As they all looked on expectantly, the witch summoned her courage 
and cast a spell.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: A gentle breeze began to blow, and the clouds parted in an instant.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
The mountains regained their lush green, and the air grew crisp and 
fresh.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: The people rejoiced and welcomed the witch.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: "So this is why I have these powers!"

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: The witch returned their greetings with a smile.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
And so the witch continued her travels under that big blue sky, 
forever and ever…

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Using her magic to bring happiness everywhere she went.
